text: @TrumpWarRoom @senatemajldr Might it be..because y'all "have too many rubber boots to walk around in..the "slush fund pool".. that's fun to do when you have a job & free medical care..and no worry as to how your going to pay bills & feed your Family..the "Coronavirus is at our doorsteps..not yours !..    '<
